subject: Cybersecurity
title: Gary McKinnon: The UFO Hacker
description: Learn Gary McKinnon: The UFO Hacker in one minute.

hook.text: A British man hacked 97 U.S. military computers looking for evidence of UFOs.

buildup.text: Gary McKinnon spent 2001-2002 breaking into NASA and Pentagon systems. He claimed he found UFO cover-ups.

discovery.text: He caused $700,000 in damage by deleting files and shutting down military networks for 24 hours.

twist.text: The U.S. demanded extradition. After a 10-year legal battle, the UK blocked it on human rights grounds.

climax.text: McKinnon exposed how poorly secured critical military systems were â€” many had blank passwords.

punchline.text: The Pentagon's password was literally blank.

quiz.question: What was Gary McKinnon searching for in military systems?
